channel.title: US sanctions on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in US sanctions on PepsFeeder

item.title: Beijing's weapons in battle and Why America waged a trade war on China
item.description: In the aftermath of the Cold War, the United States changed its policy and priorities and viewed China’s economic emergence as a major threat to its interests in the decades to come.

item.title: Oil contracts in euros Russia continues to get rid of the dominance of the dollar
item.description: Russia’s biggest oil company, Igor Sechin, has shifted completely to using the euro in its contracts instead of the dollar, a move aimed at protecting its dealings from US sanctions, Rosneft’s chief executive said.
